heroSection.buttonPlaceholder: What do you want to learn about?

featuresSection.feature1Desc: Learn from experienced sex psychologists who support your self-discovery.
featuresSection.feature2Desc: An open and accepting environment where all questions are welcome.
featuresSection.feature3Desc: Hands-on, interactive lessons and exercises for better intimacy.

introVideo.title: Discover New Dimensions of Intimacy
introVideo.g1sub: For those just beginning to explore the world of sexuality.
introVideo.g2sub: Couples and individuals seeking to improve intimacy, communication, and emotional connection.
introVideo.g3sub: Those who have already started working on themselves and are exploring complex questions of body and mind.
introVideo.g4sub: Professionals and dedicated learners who want to – or already do – support others in this field.

calltoAction.title: Have questions about our courses?
calltoAction.sub: Feel free to write to us – our team is here to help.

coursesBanner.title: Our Courses
coursesBanner.sub: Online courses by experts – without taboos

testimonialsSection.sectionTitle1: Learning about intimacy, body awareness, and desires can be a liberating experience. Sexuality is a natural part of life, yet it's often surrounded by taboos. We want to change that with knowledge and empathy.
testimonialsSection.sectionSub1: More than information – this is a safe space where questions are welcome. We help you navigate the world of feelings, relationships, and boundaries.
testimonialsSection.sectionTitle2: Everyone deserves joyful and consensual sexual experiences. That requires reliable information, openness, and self-awareness – exactly what our platform supports.
testimonialsSection.sectionSub2: Sexuality is not just biology – it's also about society, emotions, and culture. We talk about all of these openly.
testimonialsSection.sectionTitle3: Many missed out on proper sex education in school – or were taught based on myths. Here's a chance to rebuild your knowledge and gain confidence in these topics.
testimonialsSection.sectionSub3: Our goal is to support everyone to grow at their own pace and without shame – whether it’s about relationships, identity, or pleasure.

newsletterSection.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter!
newsletterSection.subtitle: Be the first to know about our updates and exclusive content.

metaTags.homeDescription: An online platform for sex education where experts help you explore and grow your intimacy.
metaTags.coursesDescription: Discover the depths of sexuality with our interactive courses led by sex psychologists.
